answers.answer: Me , my body gets super itchy. Especially my tummy. Im 30w , but the itching started around 25w. Dont scratch thou. Scratching when its itchy causes stretch marks. Just tell your husband/boyfriend to put lotion on the itching.
Get yourself some Cocoa Butter Lotion (I just use the cheap CVS brand).. It soothes the itch and helps prevent stretch marks on your tummy. Plus it smells great! :)
Lotion! Whenever i get itchy its what i do

38 wks tomorrow...I want to roll around on sand paper...lol...instead I use palmers cocoa butter, it helps soothe the itchy belly. I try so hard not to scratch, I heard it can cause stretch marks and so far I don't have any :-)
I will give it a try :)Thankyou everyone :)
You should also have your sugar tested at your next prenatal appointment the itching is also a sign of gestational diabetes

question: Im 35 weeks and my whole body is so itchy to the point where I itch myself red raw, anyone know why and any remedies??Oh believe me I have tried to ignore the itch but its that bad :/
title: Anyone else super itchy!!??
